alert.note: Alert for East Becker; East Polk; Hubbard; Mahnomen; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 7:02PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Hubbard, southeastern Polk, south central Beltrami, northeastern Mahnomen, northeastern Becker and southern Clearwater Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 701 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Weme to near Becida to Dorset. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. Brief funnel clouds are possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Park Rapids, Fosston, Bagley, Clearbrook, Island Lake in Mahnomen County, Lake George and Gonvick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central, north central and northwestern Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: East Becker; East Polk; Hubbard; Mahnomen; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater
